title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu does not appear to have any effect. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: Close all editors, create a new file (e.g., f1.txt), and then select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. However, nothing happens when the option is chosen.
